WorkItem.ClosedComment: This has been asked and answered several times
WorkItem.Description:
The head of Onyxia quest rewards a ring/trinket/neck piece, but can be completed only once. For some reason Rawr is optimizing two rings equipped at the same time - and this cannot be. Using the Rawr.Moonkin module ver 2.2.27.
 
The quest rewards are:
- Polished Dragonslayer's Signet
- Sparkling Onyxia Tooth Pendant
- Purified Onyxia Blood Talisman
 
The item itself is not unique equipped, but there is just no way to get more than one of these.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Quest reward from "A Most Puzzling Circumstance"

Comments.Message:
This is a Blizzard itemisation error. The item isn't marked as unique by Blizzard, and so the data in the Armoury and on Wowhead isn't marked as unique. Thus Rawr doesn't see the ring as unique.

To fix it right click the item and Edit then mark it as unique. Simples.

Most items one can get via quest awards are not marked as unique equipped, and naturally (unless its a daily/repeating quest), most items can't be double equipped because they are quest awards. Blizzard wont bother to mark these as unique equipped, but Rawr might encounter such errors quite often.
